hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' | { read file_path; if [ -n "$file_path" ]; then if echo "$file_path" | grep -Eq '\.(ts|tsx|js|jsx|mjs|cjs)$'; then npx -y eslint --fix "$file_path" || true; npx -y prettier -w "$file_path"; elif echo "$file_path" | grep -Eq '\.(json|md|mdx|yaml|yml|css|scss)$'; then npx -y prettier -w "$file_path"; fi; fi; }
